pageProduct.name: Waterpik Whitening Waterflosser
pageProduct.description:
Information

Restore Your Natural Whiteness with Waterpik Whitening Waterflosser.

Precision whitening while you floss. It restores your natural whiteness in just 4 weeks by removing hard-to-reach stains. It's proven to remove an additional 25% more stains than brushing alone, provides all the clinical benefits of water flossing, is gentle as regular toothpaste, removes plaque, and promotes healthier gums.

Removes an additional 25% of stains vs brushing alone.* Proven safe on teeth and gums, and as gentle as regular toothpaste.

Effective plaque removal. Removes up to 99.9% of plaque from treated areas*

Healthier gums. Up to 50% more effective for improving Gum Health vs String Floss*

Essential for Implants. Up to 2x as effective for improving gum health around implants vs string floss*

Drag to spin

General Information

Restore Your Natural Whiteness with Waterpik Whitening Waterflosser. Precision Whitening While You Floss.

Delivers precision whitening while you water floss. It restores your natural whiteness in just 4 weeks by removing hard-to-reach stains. It’s proven to remove an additional 25% more stains than brushing alone, provides all the clinical benefits of water flossing, is gentle as regular toothpaste, removes plaque, and promotes healthier gums.
 

 

KEY FEATURES

• Removes Stains: Clinically Proven To Remove An Additional 25% Of Teeth Stains Vs. Brushing Alone
• Effective Plaque Removal: Removes Up To 99.9% Of Plaque From Treated Areas
• Healthier Gums: Clinically Proven Up To 50% More Effective For Improving Gum Health Vs. String Floss
• Ideal For Implants: Clinically Proven Up To 2X As Effective For Improving Gum Health Around Implants Vs. String Floss Using The Plaque Seeker® Tip
• Essential For Braces: Clinically Proven Up To 3X As Effective For Removing Plaque Around Braces Vs. String Floss Using The Orthodontic Tip
• Leaves Your Mouth Feeling Incredibly Fresh And Clean
• Removes Plaque And Debris Deep Between Teeth And Below The Gumline Where Brushing And String Flossing Can't Reach


Warnings

READ INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE USE.

CAUTION

Do not plug this device into a voltage system that is different from the voltage system specified on the device or charger.

Keep whitening tablet bottle and tablets out of reach of children and pets. Whitening tablets contain xylitol which may be harmful to pets.
* Consult Whitening Water Flosser literature and bottle label for complete use and care instructions. Do not place tablet in reservoir.

Ingredients

Whitening Tablets Contains: Glycine, xylitol, sucralose, flavor (aroma), copovidone (VP\VA copolymer), sodium lauryl sulfate, dextrin,
magnesium stearate, silica

Directions

READ INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE USE.

USAGE ADVICE

Use one tablet daily to remove stains from hard to reach areas between teeth and at the gumline that other products miss.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
